hero.tagLine: Give everyone the opportunity to offer their best
hero.description: Secret Friend encourages acts of kindness between employees

bottomLead.description: Available online or in your favorite store

step1.title: PROTÉGÉ EXPERIENCE
step1.description:
Shares his state of mind with someone who is willing to listen
Feels a protective presence
Feels gratitude and encouragement
Experiences moments of surprise and joy

step2.title: GUARDIAN ANGEL EXPERIENCE
step2.description:
Gets informed about your protégé through the application
Takes on benevolent challenges
Takes initiative
Earns points and rewards

step3.title: MANAGER EXPERIENCE
step3.description:
Measures the behavioral intelligence of its employees
Identifies hidden skills
Delegates the distribution of small daily practices
Facilitates the decompartmentalization of services
Gets a stronger involvement in the company
Get an alert tool for situations of suffering

concept.title: The 3 minutes a day that change the way you see the world
concept.desc1: Our concept invites employees to bring out the goodness in them and to show it through caring actions.
concept.desc2: Secret Friend breaks down the barriers to goodwill with dynamic, playful and varied encouragement.
concept.protege:
Each participant is cared for
 by a « Guardian Angel »
concept.angel: Each participant is at the same time the Guardian Angel of someone else
